properties.description: Parameters to watch for. This watch list comes prefilled with best practice, and can be extended by you to include additional parameters. Parameters that you wish not be alerted on can be set with 'EnableAlerts' == 'false'
properties.rawContent:
ParameterName,Comment,EnableAlerts,Option,ProductionValues,NonProdValues,ProductionSeverity,NonProdSeverity
gw/accept_remote_trace_level,CPIC and RFC: adopt remote trace level?,True,,0,0,High,High
login/password_change_for_SSO,Handling of password change enforcements in Single Sign-On situations,True,,1,1,High,Medium
icm/accept_remote_trace_level,Accept external switch of trace level,True,,0,0,High,High

auth/rfc_authority_check,Execution option for the RFC authority check,True,GE,1,1,High,High
gw/acl_mode,Mode for non existing ACL file,True,,0,1,High,High
gw/logging,settings for gateway logging,True,AlertOnAnyChange,,,High,Medium

login/password_expiration_time,Dates until password must be changed,True,LE,90,180,High,Medium
